profile.name: Henry Marks
profile.description: A skilled web developer with 2 years of experience in Angular development within an agile working environment. Proficient in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Experienced in developing responsive web applications with a focus on user experience. Passionate about learning new technologies and problem-solving.

detailList.description: Developed skills in HTML, CSS, Typescript, Angular, unit testing, responsive design and RESTful web services.
Planned, developed, tested, deployed and maintained UI features within an agile team, consistently meeting sprint goals to deliver new features.
Led the implementation of UI features as the only developer for several projects, integrating back-end services while creating new components to fit within an existing Angular application.
Collaborated with product design, UX and testing teams to ensure all requirements of features are met to high standards.

Managing a large number of network installation projects to completion, driving coordination between several areas of the business and external parties to meet deadline based provisioning targets regularly.
Effectively communicating with multiple stakeholders about ongoing projects to manage expectations and forge strong working relationships that created new sales opportunities for the business.
Staying tenacious, using initiative to overcome problems in the installation process and then feeding back on what can be changed for longer term improvements in processes as the business grows.
Demonstrating an increased ability to communicate effectively to varied audiences, overcoming the difficulties of language barriers and working in different cultures.
Showing initiative and flexibility in a sometimes-unpredictable environment to deal with sudden problems, finding solutions swiftly while maintaining a high level of professionalism.

data.title: Level 4 Software Development Apprenticeship, Distinction
data.organisation: Institute for Apprenticeships and Technical Education
